verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If toiling in the desert leaves you empty and dryIf toiling in the desert leaves you empty and dry
An oasis is the House of God
where a fountain satisfies
Let the praise begin to flow
and let the worship quench your thirst
It's a little taste of Heaven on earth
As we lift our hands to Jesus
standing side by side with you
We get to do what Angels love to do
And as we blend our voices
to proclaim our Savior's worth
It's a little taste of Heaven on earth
